title: Looking for unformal italic font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015040224im_/http:/typophile.com/files/302uhab_5754.jpg)

Dear Type

I am looking for the informal italic font appearing in the poster shown on the top.  
I have taken a look at several modern types, but could not find that one.

I am shure, one of the professionals here will be able to identify the font.

Thx.
author: space

comments.content:
You will have better luck if you post this query in Type ID:

[http://typophile.com/forum/29](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015040224/http:/typophile.com/forum/29 "http://typophile.com/forum/29")
